comments.author: macson
comments.body: Quote from: amazingseller1 on April 29, 2023, 05:16:54 PMQuote from: Royse777 on April 28, 2023, 11:28:24 PMDo you have a collateral?No one cares why you need it. Only need the security so that you are paying back.i got few option and one of them to link your wallet to my 124 NFTs collection or i can send all of them to you and after i repay you can send them back . there are many current NFTs that have no value at all because the NFT hype has passed, so NFTs cannot be used as collateral. (apart from that, most likely the NFT that you have has no value at all)

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: How much are your NFTs worth? Try nftfi.com if they're worth anything, if not, just go away.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: amazingseller1 on April 28, 2023, 12:55:29 PMLoan amount:1.3 BTCYou are asking for a loan of 1.3 Bitcoin without any valid collateral. How could you even think that anyone will give you the loan without any proper collateral. That NFT thing was a hype of the 2021 and nobody will fall into that thing anymore. Like Royse777 said if you want the loan then provide the collateral if you have a collateral other than NFT than you might get the loan otherwise lenders will consider you as a scammer.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Imagine if someone would just send a total stranger BTC worth of $39KJust like that.... I am just curious, when you woke up the day you posted this... Was you really thinking that "Yeah.. Maybe somebody will give me $39K today."You littery have better chance to stand outside a luxury resturant and beg customers walking in and out, maybe some drunk rich dude want to have some fun and give you money. Even that´s like one out of one million chance, but its bigger chance then anyone on the internet would "LOAN" you $39K.I dont want to be rude or anything, but i am just mind blowing that nothing seems to have any limit these days.I see this more and more on this forum, and i always ask my self, why tf does this people not find a work, using a bank, or ask some friend or family...?But is not the best thing to brainstorm and try to find out something your good at and see if its possible to make any money out of that instead?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: amazingseller1 on May 02, 2023, 07:33:41 PMAre you serious ?! im taking 1.3 and returning it almost 1.5+You won't be taking a single satoshi here, because the chances of you running off and not returning anything is much more likely.  Flip the tables for a second; would send $40K to some anonymous internet-forum-newbie who's been engaged in scalping hacked accounts?Quote from: amazingseller1 on May 02, 2023, 07:33:41 PMits business like taking loan from bank .No bank gives out loans without valid collateral, so in a way you are correct; you'll get the same answer here as you would from a bank: No!Quote from: amazingseller1 on May 02, 2023, 07:33:41 PMand ur the silly one here dropping this harsh comments without knowing FACTS ! yeah i do have a big collection and its from many Artists and most of them are Verified NFTs  .and who are you to say my collection worth 1% ? I Hope this Forum upgrading RANKS by knowledge and Not by buying Merits or useless POSTS Lol, don't get your panties in a bunch.  Did you really expect someone to just hand over $40K without questioning the risk they're taking?  Quote from: amazingseller1 on May 02, 2023, 07:33:41 PMNo one will give me ? Fine but dont ever judge me Too late!  You're the one scalping stolen or hacked accounts, and getting butthurt when no one volunteers to send you a small fortune without any guarantees of reimbursement.  Kind of hard not to place judgement on your values and ethics at this point.
